company_info.Company Description: cmts is engaged in the data entry outsourcing and supply of skilled/semi skilled & unskilled Manpower across the industry spectrum. Our pool of manpower ranges from professionals such as Sales & technical professionals in different categories, IT professionals, aviation sector, technical profiles, engineers, non-technical in-house professionals, administrative profiles, Accountant, HR, Back office, Data Entry Operator etc. Our organization's goal is total clients satisfaction through quality and personalized delivery of each and every service. We therefore exist to cater the need of these prospecting employers/companies since our inception in 2008.

api_data.job_title: Travel back Office manager for saanewal Location,

jd_information.description: Required Tour and travels back office manage for Travel Company at saanewal Location.Post-BACK OFFICE Operations in Travel segmentDeals in These segments(Domestic/international consultants/visa consultants) AND 2 IN FIELD MARKETINGExp-6,Month-3 YearsSalary-15000 -25000 per month + incentives+ OT (Negotiable).Job Detail- Responsibilities- • Ability to handle packages (National / International)• Knowledge about national/international vendors for tour packages.• Air Ticketing / hotel bookings• Deals with travel agents or retailers• Making online reservations• Coordinate all travel logistics/Transportation• Guide the travellers through the tour’s itinerary• Co-ordinating with clients for visa documentation and application.• Should be able to convert leads and can do chat and voice call with customers.· Be able to interact and convince corporates for make bookings through our travel agency· Cold calling and fixing meetings – field marketing Skills and competencies- • Have ability to work in team• Good communication skills in English, Hindi and local language• Personally motivated and positive Attitude• Knowledge of computerSalary -15000 -25000 per month + incentives+ OT (Negotiable).Intrested can call to Aditya kumar kumar on 8527750087 or email ypur cv on hr@cmts.in or cmts.hr2gmail.com
